frontmatter.title: Fusion HCI
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion HCI
description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

<PageDescription>

More ways to explore

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink>Articles and blogs</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink>Videos</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

## Articles and blogs

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Deploy a bare metal OpenShift cluster in less than a week"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@bjrandal.dev/deploying-an-enterprise-grade-bare-metal-openshift-cluster-in-less-than-a-week-ad17b5a307d0"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Fusion HCI adds 8x the GPU power"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2024/02/fusion-hci-adds-8x-gpu-power.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Fusion HCI - installing OpenShift on bare metal"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/d9f49c0eda6c"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Empowering research with container-based computing at the University of Queensland "
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jake-carroll/2023/08/21/ibm-techxchange-conference-session?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Bare metal OpenShift with Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/ibm-storage-fusion-hci-2-7-1-83b1b0bce11d"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Deploying Fusion HCI in your data center"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@srisaurabh12/deploying-ibm-storage-fusion-hci-in-your-data-centre-ccae88253fdb"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Openshift Data Foundation on IBM Fusion HCI 2.7.1"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/openshift-data-foundation-ibm-storage-fusion-hci-271-dhanashree-patil-hosuf"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Unlocking innovation with IBM Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"

      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Installation and configuration of Data Foundation Provider on IBM Fusion HCI"

      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Hosted Control Plane and Multi-Cluster Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/hosted-control-plane-with-red-hat-multicluster-engine-and-hypershift-621b6e1ee7f8"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Performing compute node maintenance for Fusion HCI"

  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="IPI bare metal installation of OpenShift"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/ipi-bare-metal-installation-of-red-hat-openshift-container-platform-with-cluster-wide-proxy-362591b9b634"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="IBM Fusion HCI in a disconnected environment"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/upgrading-openshift-container-platform-in-disconnected-environment-for-ibm-storage-fusion-hci-8b85d0bd2ecc"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Performance boost for AI workloads on Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2023/12/fusion-hci-performance-boost-for-ai-apps.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="New storage server option for Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/12/new-storage-server-options-in-spectrum.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Upgraded compute power for Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/10/upgraded-compute-power-for-spectrum.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Support for AI and ML apps on Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/08/support-for-ai-and-ml-apps-in-ibm.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Inside the storage compute servers of Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/08/inside-storagecompute-servers-of-ibm.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Connecting it together in Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/06/connecting-it-together-in-ibm-spectrum.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="The servers that power Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/06/the-servers-that-power-ibm-spectrum.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="An introduction to the hardware of Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://hardware-fusion.blogspot.com/2022/05/an-introduction-to-hardware-of-ibm.html"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="IBM Fusion HCI: Simplified OpenShift cluster expansion"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/marcibm-fusion-hci-simplified-openshift-cluster-expansion-ec11932f80d3"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Onboarding and auto-discovery of baremetal servers on IBM Storage Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@pruthvi.t.dakappa/onboarding-and-auto-discovery-of-baremetal-servers-on-ibm-storage-fusion-hci-f31b415ed347"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Unlocking the power of AI across the hybrid cloud with watsonx and Fusion HCI"
      actionIcon="launch"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      href="https://www.ibm.com/blog/announcement/addressing-need-for-watsonx-and-fusion-hci/"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row className="resource-card-group-3-across">
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterSm>
    <ResourceCard
      subTitle="Blog"
      title="Accelerating the deployment of OpenShift with Fusion HCI"
      aspectRatio="2:1"
      actionIcon="launch"
      href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/addressing-app-modernisation-challenges-with-ibm-fusion-hci-a-reliable-highly-available-and-ec01ca7ece4e"
      >
  </ResourceCard>
</Column>
</Row>

## Videos
<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="IBM Fusion HCI System overview"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JijBTRyiw0I"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Fusion HCI overview](/images/hci-overview.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Running virtual machines on Fusion HCI"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNgXMfnUmYk"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Virtual machines on Fusion HCI](/images/rob-coventry.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="IBM Cloud Satellite on Fusion HCI"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdWc2XHaU6A"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![IBM Cloud Satellite on Fusion HCI](/images/ibm-cloud-satellite.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="How the IBM Office of the CIO uses Fusion HCI"
  subTitle="Interview"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jRlDIEIV6V4"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Fusion HCI overview](/images/john-mullin.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Betchle talks about the role of Fusion HCI as part of their Internal Developer Platform"
  subTitle="Presentation"
  href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kj6t-4-aVcU"
  actionIcon="launch"
>

![Betchle talks about the role of Fusion HCI as part of their Internal Developer Platform](/images/betchel.jpeg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
